snippet: The authorities disrupted a terror attack in Montevideo when they arrested a man at a mobile home that contained Molotov cocktails, suspected pipe bombs and firearms, the F.B.I. said Monday.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation says that authorities disrupted a terror attack in the small city of Montevideo, Minn, when they arrested Buford Rogers at a mobile home that contained Molotov cocktails, suspected pipe bombs and firearms.
lead_paragraph: The authorities disrupted a terror attack in Montevideo when they arrested a man at a mobile home that contained Molotov cocktails, suspected pipe bombs and firearms, the F.B.I. said Monday.

headline.seo: Minnesota: F.B.I. Says Man Planned Terror Attack in Small City
headline.main: Minnesota: F.B.I. Says Man Planned Terror Attack in Small City
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: F.B.I. Says Man Planned Terror Attack In Small City
